item.title: 英国正在对并不存在的石油暴利征税
item.description:
让政府在北海问题上保持理智。【原文：

Let common sense prevail in the government about the North Sea. 

】

item.title: 日本首相石破茂表示不会纠结于美国贸易谈判的时间限制
item.description: 日本首相石破茂表示，日本不会在与美国的贸易谈判中因固守时间限制而损害国家利益，这表明东京不会匆忙达成协议。【原文：Japan won’t compromise its national interests in trade talks with the US by fixating on time limits, Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba said, signaling Tokyo isn’t rushing into an agreement.】

item.title: 石场用希腊债务对比回击减税要求
item.description: 日本首相石破茂回绝了减税呼吁，称日本的财政状况比希腊更糟。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba rebuffed calls for tax cuts saying that the nation’s financial conditions are worse than Greece’s.】

item.title: 美国担心苹果人工智能交易，阿里巴巴股价下跌
item.description: 有报道称，特朗普政府对苹果公司与这家中国科技公司可能达成的在iPhone手机上使用其人工智能技术的交易表示担忧，阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司的股价因此下跌。【原文：Shares of Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. slumped after a report that the Trump administration has raised concerns over Apple Inc.’s potential deal with the Chinese technology firm to make its artificial intelligence technology available on iPhones.】

item.title: 泰国首富增持顶级银行股份成为第三大股东
item.description: 泰国首富萨拉特-拉塔纳瓦迪（Sarath Ratanavadi）控制的海湾发展公司（Gulf Development Pcl）已将其在 Kasikornbank Pcl 的持股增至约 6.1 亿美元，从而成为这家商业银行的第三大股东。【原文：Gulf Development Pcl, controlled by Thailand’s richest man Sarath Ratanavadi, has raised its stake in Kasikornbank Pcl to about $610 million, making it the commercial lender’s third-largest shareholder.】

item.title: 中国化石燃料产量从创纪录水平回落
item.description: 尽管天然气、原油和煤炭价格走低，但中国政府仍将供应安全放在首位，因此 4 月份中国化石燃料产量较上月创下的历史最高水平有所下降，但与上年同期相比均有所增长。【原文：Chinese fossil fuels output fell in April from the record levels hit in the prior month, although natural gas, crude oil and coal all delivered increases compared to the previous year as the government continues to prioritize security of supply despite weaker prices.】

item.title: 牛市重拾对印度国有股票的兴趣
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 巴克莱称贸易紧张局势缓解，套利交易窗口开启
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）表示，随着中美关税紧张局势的缓解，各国央行降息的压力减小，套息交易可能会在短期内卷土重来。【原文：Carry trades may make a near-term comeback as easing US-China tariff tensions reduce pressure on central banks to cut interest rates, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 贸易战雪上加霜，泰国下调 2025 年经济增长预测
item.description: 由于全球贸易战削弱了私人投资和出口，加上国内本已疲软的消费，泰国大幅下调了今年的经济增长预期。【原文：Thailand significantly lowered its forecast for economic growth this year as the global trade war undercuts private investment and exports, adding to already-weak consumption at home.】

item.title: 对冲基金在加藤-贝森特会晤前重启日元多头交易
item.description: 对冲基金和长期投资者在本周美日可能举行货币谈判之前重新进入交易，期待日元反弹。【原文：Hedge funds and long-term investors are re-entering trades looking for the yen to rally ahead of potential currency talks this week between the US and Japan.】

item.title: 中国工厂产出在关税混乱高峰期表现出韧性
item.description: 中国 4 月份的工业产值增长速度超过预期，凸显了这个世界第二大经济体的韧性，也使人们对与美国贸易紧张局势迅速缓和后的经济增长更加乐观。【原文：China’s industrial output expanded faster than expected in April, highlighting the resilience of the world’s second-largest economy and feeding optimism about growth following a quick de-escalation of trade tensions with the US.】

item.title: 香港顶级建筑商迎来周末销售狂潮
item.description: 香港最大的房地产开发商新鸿基地产有限公司（Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd.）在收到超过 34,000 份竞标书后，于周日再次售出 376 个单位，成为数月来因低利率而最抢手的项目之一。【原文：Hong Kong’s biggest property developer Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd. sold another 376 flats on Sunday after receiving more than 34,000 bids, becoming one of the most sought after projects in months thanks to low interest rates.】

item.title: 日本首相石破支持率下降，七月前不会下台
item.description: 据日本主要新闻机构周末公布的民意调查显示，日本首相石破茂政府的支持率有所下降，但他在 7 月全国大选前下台的可能性仍然不大。【原文：Support for Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s government weakened, according to public opinion surveys published by major Japanese news organizations over the weekend, although it remains unlikely he’ll be ousted before a national election in July.】

item.title: 中国房价在关税战中加速下跌
item.description: 中国 4 月份房价下跌速度加快，这表明房地产市场的低迷仍然是决策者在抵御与美国的关税战时头疼的问题。【原文：China’s home prices fell at a faster pace in April, signaling the property market slump remains a headache for policymakers as they fend off a tariff war with the US.】

item.title: 宏观前景改善，高盛上调 Topix 目标价
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists say Japan’s Topix stock gauge will benefit from a more benign macro outlook and improved sentiment for risk-taking after a cooling in US-China tariff tensions.】

item.title: 从落后到超越宝马的中国豪华汽车品牌
item.description: 在不到四年的时间里，曾以生产 30,000 元（4,200 美元）小型货车而闻名的中国小型汽车制造商塞莱斯集团有限公司击败了宝马和奔驰等传统豪华品牌，成为中国最热门的高端汽车销售商。【原文：In under four years, Seres Group Co., a small Chinese automaker once best known for its 30,000 yuan ($4,200) minivans, has beaten luxury legacy names like BMW and Mercedes to become the nation’s hottest high-end car seller.】

item.title: 警惕特朗普的期权交易员谨慎对待中国股市反弹
item.description: 贸易战的缓和给全球市场带来了一些缓解。然而，就中国股市而言，投资者仍不愿押注未来的大幅上涨。【原文：The de-escalation of the trade war has brought some relief to the market globally. Yet when it comes to Chinese equities, investors remain reluctant to bet on big gains moving forward.】

item.title: 穆迪下调美国评级 黄金周内大跌后获反弹
item.description: 由于对美国经济前景和预算赤字的担忧加剧，市场对避险资产的偏好升温，黄金在创下六个月来最大单周跌幅后反弹。【原文：Gold bounced back after its biggest weekly decline in six months, with appetite for haven assets boosted by mounting concerns about the US economic outlook and budget deficit.】

item.title: 印尼盾将因财政希望和美元疲软而延续涨势
item.description: 分析师称，印尼盾将在今年下半年延续涨势，原因是人们对审慎的财政管理抱有希望，而且美国货币前景看跌。【原文：Indonesia’s rupiah is set to extend gains in the second half of the year on hopes over prudent fiscal management and a bearish outlook for the US currency, analysts say.】

item.title: 需求回升，英国房屋要价升至历史新高
item.description: 5 月份，英国房屋要价创下历史新高，需求也有所回升，这表明房地产市场在针对购房者的减税政策结束后恢复了活力。【原文：Asking prices for UK homes rose to a new record high in May and demand picked up in a sign of the property market’s resilience after the end of a tax cut for buyers.】

item.title: 在黄金上赚了 15 亿美元的中国交易员在铜上建立了巨大赌注
item.description:
塑料行业的亿万富翁卞锡明曾在金银财宝上打下了一个有利可图的赌注。现在，他全心投入红色金属。【原文：

Plastics billionaire Bian Ximing made a lucrative bet on bullion. Now he’s all in on the red metal. 

】

item.title: 交易商担忧穆迪下调评级，原油早盘大涨后趋于平稳
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）取消了美国政府的最高信用评级，加剧了人们对全球经济增长前景的担忧，石油价格在早盘下跌后回稳。【原文：Oil steadied after an early drop, as Moody’s Ratings stripped the US government of its top credit rating, adding to concerns about the outlook for global growth.】

item.title: 交易员担忧穆迪下调美国评级，美元走软：市场综述
item.description: 周一早盘，美元走低，美国股市期货下滑，原因是对国债和美国借贷轨迹的财政担忧加剧。【原文：The dollar edged lower and US equity futures slipped in early trading Monday as fiscal concerns mounted over Treasuries and the trajectory of US borrowing.】

item.title: 高盛在日本外资银行不景气的一年中遥遥领先
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. was among major global banks to post lower profit in Japan last year, pulling back from a bumper 2023.】

item.title: 波兰投票将冲击兹罗提，亲欧盟的领跑者备受压力
item.description: 反对派民粹主义者在波兰第一轮总统选举中的表现强于预期，这将考验投资者对该国资产的偏好。【原文：A stronger-than-expected showing by opposition populists in the first round of Poland’s presidential election will test investor appetite for the country’s assets.】

item.title: 尽管有新建议，新加坡交易所仍面临退市风险
item.description: 分析师说，新加坡简化首次公开募股程序的举措，是其最近为提振奄奄一息的股票市场而采取的措施的一部分，但这一举措不太可能扭转长达数年之久的退市挤占新上市的趋势。【原文：Singapore’s move to simplify the initial public offering process, part of recent measures to boost its moribund equities market, is unlikely to reverse a yearslong trend of delistings crowding out new listings, analysts say.】

item.title: 网络安全公司 Cyera 在新一轮融资中估值 60 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，数据安全企业Cyera在新一轮投资中的估值将达到60亿美元。【原文：Data security business Cyera is set to be valued at $6 billion in a new investment round, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 为什么苹果公司仍未攻克人工智能？
item.description:
业内人士称，人工智能的持续失败将威胁到从iPhone的主导地位到机器人和其他未来产品计划的方方面面。【原文：

Insiders say continued failure to get artificial intelligence right threatens everything from the iPhone’s dominance to plans for robots and other futuristic products.

】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 由于中美两个超级大国暂时搁置了贸易争端，美国的废铜产业正急忙将堆积如山的废铜运往中国。韩国的本土原子技术吸引了全世界的目光。美国卫生部长小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.【原文：The scrap copper industry in the US is hustling to move piled up supplies over to China now that the two superpowers have put their trade dispute on a temporary pause. South Korea’s homegrown atomic technology has the world’s attention. And, US Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s desire for diet changes has the potential to impact the global food supply chain.】

item.title: 阴霾初散，德国企业高层萌生希望
item.description:
欧洲最大的经济体正在发生变化。此外，印度塔塔通信公司首席财务官还将讨论增长计划、地缘政治等问题。【原文：

A vibe shift is underway in Europe’s largest economy. Plus, the CFO of India’s Tata Communications discusses growth plans, geopolitics and more.

】
